name: Falling Titans
description:
Falling Titans

-----------------

You start with 3 units, shoot all the enemies to win and don't let them pass the platform or you lose! Purchase more units and place them left to right to win! If you find any bugs please let me know so i can fix them! This game was made by me and im a indie game developer, also this game was made with the game engine "Gdevelop"!
